DESCRIPTION: #rFire [Professor:FireIcon] , #bIce [Professor:IceIcon] , #yBolt [Professor:BoltIcon] , and #gWind [Professor:WindIcon] .
When added to #ySynthesis, trigger an extra effect.
When added to #ySynthesis, draw a card.
The number of cards you must contribute to #ySynthesis.
Remove X cards from your hand, contributing their #yElements towards this card. Next turn, add the completed version into your hand and discard the chosen cards.
A #ySpectrumized card is #yExhausted and is replaced with #yNeutralizers matching its #yElements.
Neutralizers are 0 cost cards which do not consume #yValency during #ySynthesis.
If this card is used to perform #ySynthesis, add the following card to your hand.
Burning creatures take damage at the start of their turn.
Your next #yBlock gaining card gains additional #yBlock.
Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.
Phased creatures take more damage from Attacks.
Unstable creatures take more damage from Attacks. Each turn, Unstable is reduced by #b1.
Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Choose #b1 of #b3 random cards to add into your hand.
Add an extra effect onto a card this combat.
Unlocked cards can be upgraded any number of times.
A Masterpiece can be upgraded any number of times.
Deals both single target and multi target damage. NL Scales with [Professor:FireIcon] and [Professor:BoltIcon] .
Synthesis Benefits: NL Deals #b+2 damage per [Professor:FireIcon] . NL Apply #b+1 #yStagger per [Professor:IceIcon] .
Deals multi target damage. NL Costs 1 less for each Element you add 2 or more of.
Deals multi target damage and applies Weak. NL Scales with [Professor:IceIcon] and [Professor:WindIcon] .
Draws and Upgrades cards. NL Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .
Deals damage related to cards in hand. NL Scales with [Professor:BoltIcon] .
Deals multi target damage and heals. NL Scales with [Professor:FireIcon] and [Professor:BoltIcon] .
Deals damage to enemies that intend to attack. NL Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .
Grants Block when entering your hand. NL Scales with [Professor:WindIcon] .
Kills all enemies below a certain HP. NL Scales with [Professor:IceIcon] .
